name: Zig Zag Slalom Run
description:
How far can you go?
tap the screen to change the ball's direction.
Follow the ZigZag Slalom Run path. Stay on the path and zigzag as long as you can! ZigZag Slalom Run is a fun and addictive endless runner game. React quickly and challenge yourself!
Be careful not to fall!
How to play:
- Tap to change direction.
- Stay on path.

Features:
- Awesome graphics
- A good gameplay.
- Challenges !
